TextView.android:text: Plants that can be planted in a hydroponic way are actually very many. However, people more often plant green leafy vegetables. Vegetables grown using the hydroponic method are more satisfying than planting with ordinary soil media. Hydroponic cultivation can be cultivated at home or other places. At least planting with the hydroponic method does not really require too much land. So planting with hydroponics is very suitable for the community, especially by urban communities that are limited by land.

The advantage of a hydroponic farming system is that the medium does not require soil. The media used in hydroponic farming is water. We know that planting as usual is to use soil, where soil is used to reduce nutrients so that plants can be absorbed. However, with the hydroponic growing system the soil media is replaced with water media. Many plants can be planted using the hydroponic method. The following are plants that are usually planted with the hydroponic method, namely:

2. Lettuce Hydroponic Plants
Vegetable lettuce can be an option if you want to grow in a hydroponic way. Planting lettuce is not difficult. Because lettuce plants do not require special attention or care to be able to grow large.
When we start planting lettuce, the first step is to plant seeds. Lettuce seeds only need about two weeks for the seeds to grow leaves. Lettuce plants that have grown new leaves can be transferred to the growing medium for water and nutrient solution to grow properly. Until the time you can harvest it, the outside leaves are taken and the inside will grow again quickly to replace them.

6. Tomato Hydroponic Plants
Tomatoes are one of the plants that you can grow using a hydroponic system. In addition because tomatoes have also become a favorite of the people that can be processed into a variety of dishes and suitable to be combined with various preparations. You can plant tomatoes using the hydroponic method indoors as long as there is sufficient light intensity.
If not tomato plants will be stunted growth and the results are not good. Basically, plants must get enough light intensity to grow well and produce good fruit.
